title: Real-Time Content Censorship
description: An AI system that filters explicit, violent, and slang content on mobile devices based on user preference.
modalContent: This project aims to develop an AI-powered content censorship system that detects and filters explicit, violent, and slang content in real-time based on user preferences. YOLO and CNN will be used for visual analysis, and BERT for text content.
Methods Used:
<ul>
• Visual Analysis: YOLOv4-Tiny and CNN models for real-time object detection.
• Text Analysis: BERT for detecting slang and violent language.
• Mobile Optimization: The system, optimized with TensorFlow Lite, will operate with high accuracy and low latency.
The project particularly aims to enhance digital safety for children and sensitive users.

title: Fatwa Automation in Islamic Law (Hanafi)
description: An AI system focused on the Hanafi school, answering fatwa queries using NLP and Knowledge Graphs.
modalContent: This project aims to develop an AI-powered fatwa automation system focused on the Hanafi school of Islamic law.
Methods Used:
<ul>
• Query Interpretation: User queries will be interpreted using NLP techniques with BERT and RoBERTa models.
• Information Retrieval: Relevant fatwas will be retrieved using Knowledge Graphs and semantic search.
• Summarization: Long fatwa texts will be summarized using T5.
• Text Similarity: TF-IDF and Word2Vec will be used for textual similarity.
• Completion: GPT-based methods will be applied to complete missing information.
This project aims to provide a fast, reliable, and AI-powered fatwa system for Islamic law.

title: Personal Portfolio Website (This Site)
description: My personal portfolio site built with ASP.NET Core MVC, Docker, and dynamic content fed from JSON.
modalContent: This website you are currently browsing was designed and coded by me to showcase modern web technologies.
Technical Details:
<ul>
• Backend: ASP.NET Core MVC 8.0
• Frontend: Bootstrap 5, Vanilla JavaScript (AJAX), HTML5, AOS (Animation).
• Data Management: Projects, experiences, references, and 'about me' texts are dynamically fetched from JSON files stored under `wwwroot`.
• Forms: The contact form operates via a Formspree AJAX endpoint, requiring no backend.
• Deployment: The entire site runs inside a Docker container that can be launched with a single `docker-compose` command.
This project combines my C# backend skills, dynamic content management with JSON, and modern 'glassmorphism' CSS design.

title: Real-Time Sign Language Recognition Model
description: A CNN-based model that recognizes the sign language alphabet in real-time. Used OpenCV and TensorFlow Lite.
modalContent: In this project, a CNN-based model capable of recognizing the sign language alphabet in real-time was developed.
Methods Used:
<ul>
• Model: A Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) trained on a custom-built dataset.
• Real-Time Recognition: Hand movements were detected using OpenCV for video-based recognition.
• Optimization: The model was optimized for mobile and embedded systems using TensorFlow Lite.

title: Izmit Route Planner (Kocaeli Bus)
description: A web application developed with Flask and Docker, finding the best route using Kocaeli's public transport data with the A* algorithm.
modalContent: This project is a web application that performs the most efficient route planning for Kocaeli (Izmit) using public transportation data.
Technical Details:
<ul>
• Backend: Python (Flask)
• Data Collection: Bus routes and stop information were scraped from the Kocaeli Metropolitan Municipality's transportation portal using web scraping (BeautifulSoup).
• Algorithm: The A* (A-Star) search algorithm was implemented to find the shortest path (with the fewest transfers) between two stops.
• Frontend: A simple interface (Bootstrap) where the user can select start and destination stops.
• Deployment: The application is containerized with Docker.

title: Academic Article Search and Web Scraping
description: A web app that scrapes articles from Google Scholar, saves them to MongoDB, and allows searching via Elasticsearch.
modalContent: I developed a web application that searches for academic articles from platforms like Google Scholar using web scraping techniques.
Features:
<ul>
• Data Extraction: Article title, authors, abstract, and publication information were extracted using web scraping (BeautifulSoup, Scrapy) techniques.
• Data Storage: The obtained unstructured article information was saved to the NoSQL database, MongoDB.
• Search: A powerful Elasticsearch-based search engine was integrated to allow users to query by specific attributes (author, keyword).

title: Patient Tracking and Management System
description: A hospital management system developed with Python (Django) and SQLite, adhering to relational database principles.
modalContent: This project is a hospital management system developed using Python (Django) and running on an SQLite database. It was developed in accordance with relational database normalization principles.
Features:
<ul>
• User Management: Patients can register, and doctors can manage their appointment schedules.
• Appointment System: Patients can book appointments with doctors online.
• Reporting: Storage of medical reports and management of various health procedures through a central web platform.

title: Product Catalog Application (Flask)
description: A SPA-like product listing site with Flask, MySQL, and Docker Compose. Includes an admin panel and file upload features.
modalContent: A Flask + MySQL based, single-page (SPA-like) product catalog application. The site is not for shopping; it lists products' price, image, description, and stock status.
Features:
<ul>
• User Management: User registration & login (Flask-Login).
• Roles: 'admin' (add/manage products) and 'user' (view/filter) roles.
• Product Management: Admin can add new products by uploading a file (product image) via the interface.
• Filtering: Search/filter by category, stock status, and name.
Technical Details:
<ul>
• Backend: Python 3.11, Flask, Flask-SQLAlchemy, Flask-Login, Gunicorn
• Database: MySQL 8
• Frontend: Bootstrap 5, Vanilla JS
• Deployment: Docker Compose
